code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const aboutData=[{id:1,icon:'icon-fire',title:15,subtitle:'Projects completed'},{id:2,icon:'icon-badge',title:'02',subtitle:'Years of Experience'}];const AboutBox=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about__boxes grid",children:aboutData.map(data=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:`about__icon ${data.icon}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"about__title",children:data.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"about__subtitle",children:data.subtitle})]})]},data.id))});};export default AboutBox;
